Text: I've been stuck at 99.9% for a while. Are there any more seeds of this, or does the uploader have bad RAM or something?

Also, I tried testing the flacs, and they test fine, and the jpeg _looks_ fine, so maybe it's the OCR text (back ocr.doc) that's not finishing. The text in there looks a little garbled to me, but I assumed it was the program I'm using to view it (I don't have the real Microsoft Word). Anyway, at least the audio is fine even if the whole torrent won't finish.
i believe flac's are ok. azureus tells that front.jpg and txt file didn't complete, but they are ok. probably just a hash error.

Sophos is reporting a trojan in the front.jpg
which might explain the problem here.

I have no idea what the problem is
I can recreate the torrent file
